Message:
She had illusions that Urd
was younger, and Belldandy
was still in her womb...

Time had returned to before I...
before Skuld was born...

Mother continued to call me Urd,
and Father, unable to take any
more, got up and left.

I was the only one left
to take care of my mother.

But instead, I escaped to school
and buried myself in research.

Being away from home,
I could finally be me again...
My heart felt so free.

I even made a friend.
She wasn’t the nicest person...
but she made school fun.

But I knew...
If I went back home,
